name: Gaius The Wizard
description:
Gaius The Wizard is part of a series of dark fantasy cinematic poems, combining B+W visuals with a poetic narrative. 

See the hooded man
Gaius, the fool. 
Would have you believe and bleed. 
Grounding you down
in mortar and pestle. 
Stars dazed
Dust into spells. 
Memories spilled in beaker. 
Gaius the Wizard!
No, Gaius the fool.
